description: This file defines React functional components used for visual effects in a camera/animation context, specifically tap ripple and heart favorite animations, utilizing the Remotion library for video rendering.

methods.name: TapPulse
methods.description: A React component displaying a circular ripple animation to indicate tap/click actions.

methods.name: HeartFavorite
methods.description: A React component that renders a heart icon animation for favoriting effects.
